title: Mapaseka Mpuru
text:
Mapaseka Mpuru (born 9 April 1998) is a South African football <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a>. She plays for <a href="Tuks%20LFC">Tuks LFC</a> and the <a href="South%20Africa%20women%27s%20national%20football%20team">South Africa women's national football team</a>.
Playing career.
She played with the U20 national team; Mpuru is then named in 2019 to take part in the <a href="2019%20FIFA%20Women%27s%20World%20Cup">2019 FIFA Women's World Cup</a>.
